thi-ap8:4.2: aruṇo nāma → aruṇā nāma (bj) | aruṇavā nāma (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap8:4.4: vāritaṃ vārayāmahaṃ → cārikaṃ cārayāmahaṃ (bj) | nagulaṃ pādayāmahaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | na mālaṃ pādayāmahaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap8:16.3: Dubbaṇṇiyaṃ na jānāmi → duggatiṃ nābhijānāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
